reviewText: An absolute masterpiece. Bogart and Bergman's chemistry is timeless. A must-watch for any film enthusiast.
Years later, and this game is still a benchmark for open-world RPGs. The storytelling is incredible.
Frank Herbert's world-building is second to none. A dense but incredibly rewarding read that has shaped science fiction for decades.
Bong Joon Ho is a genius. This film is a thrilling, hilarious, and devastating look at class struggle. The less you know going in, the better.
Fleetwood Mac's magnum opus. Every track is a classic. The raw emotion from the band's turmoil is palpable.
